section.name: Properties of the maven-javanet-plugin plugin
section.p: This plugin recognizes the following properties.

tr.td: The name of your java.net project.
None. This must be given explicitly. Usually it should be in your project.properties
The name of the folder in your documents and files section to which distribution files are uploaded. Used by the javanet:dist goal. It can be something like "/release".
The CVSROOT variable used to connect to the java.net CVS server. Used by the javanet:dist goal.
The CVS directory to which site contents is deployed . Used by the javanet:site goal.
